coded_answer.p: Thank you for your letter which I received last week.

If a student is ill, we will return the money but you should tell us untill one week before we start. And you are staying at the Palace Hotel, which is located in the town Centrecentre. You can take buses or our school buses. It costs forty pence. If you take public buses, it costs more expensive than the school bus.

The end-of-conference party is going to start from Seven o'clock. One of our teacherteachers, who will be votedelected by studentstudents is makingwill make a speech for one hour. After, a student is makingwill make a speech about what he or she havehas learned., and dinerdinner. In my opinion, you should wear normal clothclothes. I would like to suggest that you should visit building of sixty two which is consisted on the sixty second floor. There are eye-max cinema, museums, a gareltygallery. This is very famous in our city.
I hope that my advice will help you.
I look forward to hearing soon from youfrom you soon.

Pusan Castle is loctedlocated in the South of Pusan. This is the biggest and oldest in Pusan. There are exhibited historcallhistorical things, picthurspictures and clothesHistorical things, pictures and clothes are exhibited there. It was built four hundreadhundred years ago. When you go up to the top of the castle, you can see the whole town., and there areis a very big Parkpark in the Castle. Pusan Castle showshows about KoreaKorean history from when one of our KingKings made our country. etc. and there are a lot of facilities in Pusan Castle. RestuarantA restaurant. ShopA shop specially for groupgroups. They can be given a discount. What is more, every placesplace is explained byin English. So you do not need pamplat, but, the entrance fee is a little expensive. It costcosts ten pounds. fortunatelyFortunately Ifif somebody visit the castle over ten peopleover ten people visit the castle, they give them a discount.
